text: Butter & Gun$ EP is the fifth release by Blue Scholars, a hip-hop duo from Seattle, Washington. The album is a digital-only release and is available on iTunes and other digital outlets. ==Track listing== #"Loyalty" – 4:01 #"Butter & Gun$ (Loyalty II)" – 3:41 #"27" – 3:48 #"Loyalty (Instrumental)" – 3:58 #"Butter & Gun$ (Loyalty II) [Instrumental]" – 3:42 #"27 (Instrumental)" – 3:47 Category:Blue Scholars albums Category:2007 EPs
title: Butter & Gun$ EP
